department.ch: 工業管理研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 針對工業管理領域典型的幾種決策問題，包含生產決策問題、報童問題、協調機制問題，探討決策者之間的競爭與合作決策，加上考慮決策者的風險態度對決策的影響；期望達到學生可以了解問題，針對問題寫出相對應的OR模型，以及利用合適的方法求出合適解及最佳解，可以進一步做分析與比較。
goal.en: Considering the benchmark problems, including production problems, newsvendor problems, coordination mechanisms, and etc., the course is designed to help students understand the problems, write out the problems into neat OR model-representations, and solve the problems with appropriate tools. We also consider and discuss the effect on decisions with decision makers' risk attitude.

outline.ch:
Ch1: Production Problem
Ch2: Newsvendor Problem
Ch3: Coordination Mechanism
Ch4: Risk Averse Decisions in Newsvendor Problem
Ch5: Risk Averse Decisions in Coordinations
Ch6: Competition Problems
Ch7: Deterministic Problems vs Stochastic Problems
Ch8: Different Structues of Supply Chain
Ch9: Multi-dimension (factors) of utility function
